channel.title: Crazy-VPS [ Cheapest & most powerful VPS's ] Starting @ $3.95/PM!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://crazy-vps.com/bblogo.png[/img]
Welcome to Crazy-Vps,
Website: [url=http://crazy-vps.com/]http://crazy-vps.com/[/url]
Plans: [url=http://crazy-vps.com/hosting.html]http://crazy-vps.com/hosting.html[/url]
Order: [url=http://crazy-vps.com/client/index.php/order]http://crazy-vps.com/client/index.php/order[/url]
$3.95 VPS : [url=http://crazy-vps.com/client/index.php/order/13]http://crazy-vps.com/client/index.php/order/13[/url]
We are one of the largest on RuneScape private server hosting and now we advertise ourselves
[b]How are you the largest yet you have only just advertised?[/b]
[i]We have been supplying VPS's too two Host's on R-s[/i]
[i] MoccHosting PavHosts - Pavillionhost [/i]
[b]Why are you so cheap?[/b]
[i]We cut out the middle-man , We don't pay any extra fees, So why should you?[/i]
[b]What plans do you have?[/b]
[i]We currently offer Virtual Private Server Hosting ( VPS ), We support Linux & Windows And you can see a full list of our offers and prices here[/i]
[url=http://crazy-vps.com/hosting.html]http://crazy-vps.com/hosting.html[/url]
[b]How long will i have to wait for my VPS credentials to be sent to me?[/b]
[i]Your credentials will be sent to you with-in 60 minutes of payment. [/i] [b]Do you offer any kind of DDoS protection?[/b]
[i]All our Virtual machines come with CISCO DDoS protection, Up-to 1GBPS.[/i]
[img]http://puu.sh/1ZrXL[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1ZrZ0[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/1Zs0i[/img][/center]
